description: Albert de Morcerf was born between General Fernand, who is setting his sights on becoming the next president, and Mercedes, also known as the flower of high society, he was raised in comfort. He meets The Count of Monte Cristo in a city called Luna, which is situated on the surface of the moon. He ends up being attracted to The Count`s elegant outlaw behaviours and becomes captivated by him.
name: Albert de Morcerf
